name: Scrunko Blunko (ScrunkoGame, ParkerIsPk, Kisora)
description:
Scrunko Blunko is a first person adventure game where you wander through a strange world full of silly characters where you never know what to expect. Collect tools, solve puzzles, and play through a multitude of levels!

This game is in development. Everything that you see while playing is subject to change and most likely will. The current release takes place in the middle of the overall plot and is not the true beginning of the game.

Controls: 

wasd: move

L-Shift: Sprint

L-Ctrl: Crouch

Hand out: Left click and hold to grab items when your hand pops up. Right click to kick.

PlunGun out: Hold left click to aim and release to fire. Spam left click for more pull force. Right click to reload.
